title: MDBuild 15.0 with VisualStudio 2017 deletes c++ dll used in .net project
body:
Using following command to create package



	& "$MsbuildFullPath" $csprojfile `
		/p:VisualStudioVersion=15.0 `
		/p:DeployOnBuild=true `
		/p:Configuration=Release `
		/p:Platform=x64 `
		/p:OverwriteReadOnlyFiles=true `
		/p:OutputPath=c:\bin\x64\Release `
		/p:TargetFrameworkVersion=v4.7.1 `
		/p:BuildFromPackagingScript=true 

Until 14.0 it was not getting deleted,with 15.0 c++ dll are deleted

nodes.body: Does any one has faced similar issue or solution is known
